name: Radio Scavenger
description:
Radio Scavenger
game played entirely by spacebar.

This game is kinda art project for me. So you you are interested in one button games try it out.

GGJ Build

As for end of GGJ(while it was still working) game had like 3 functions Start the game(press space at the beginning), Collect Radios(press space while walking near radio devices), Exit game by talking a Bus(with space).

03.02.2017 Build

This build made for 1GAM. It's not what I wanted it to be but it's better then before.
Radio stations have sound now.
Textures on the buildings.
And it should work better.
